content: yarn hobby lobby i love this cotton medium weight #4 yarn 100% cotton 180 yds per 3 5 oz skein less than 1 skein of each taupe sage curry glowing burnt sienna materials us size g/7 4 5 mm stitch markers puffy wasp nest by dana bernhardt poly-fil yarn needle scissors u s stitch key chain s = chain s st s = stitch es slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet specialty stitches scblo = single_crochet in the back loop only hdcblo = half_double_crochet in the back loop only decrease = single_crochet 2 together decrease hdc2tog = half_double_crochet 2 together decrease puff = yarn over insert hook yarn over draw up a loop 4 times yo pull through 9 loops email for pattern support danaswanderlustcrochet@gmail com 1 puffy wasp nest by dana bernhardt size one size approximately 7 tall by 12 around notes finished project is meant to be lumpy and uneven if you want to skip the magic loop you can chain 3 slip_stitch to the first chain chain 1 then work round 1 pattern is worked in continuous rounds stitch markers should be used in the first stitch of each round change colors by completing the last stitch with the new color commas in the pattern indicate moving to the next stitch be careful not to skip the last stitch of the round unless otherwise specified in the pattern for authenticity do the whole project in taupe i opted for a fall palette just because i liked it please note the colors i used could reduce the effectiveness of deterring wasps so i also added some doterra peppermint essential oil to the colored project special note after the rounds of puff stitches you will be doing a round of single crochets this pic explains exactly where to put your stitches email for pattern support danaswanderlustcrochet@gmail com 2 puffy wasp nest by dana bernhardt 1 be careful not to skip the 1st half_double_crochet of the round it can be hidden by your last puff 2 the stitch immediately after the half_double_crochet is the next stitch to work into this will appear just to the right of the puff 3 the next stitch at the very top of the puff is the chain skip it and work into the next half_double_crochet when changing colors at the end of a puff round grab the new color to complete the last chain in the round pattern taupe form a magic loop and chain 1 round 1 6 single_crochet in the loop 6 remember the stitch marker in the first stitch of every round email for pattern support danaswanderlustcrochet@gmail com 3 puffy wasp nest by dana bernhardt round 2 2
